title: Twitter : number of monetizable daily active U.S. users 2017 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monetizable daily active users in millions
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
There is a difference of 6.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '17.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Number of monetizable daily active users in millions 31.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '19 and the minimum is found at Q4 '17 where Quarter is 25.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
There is a difference of 6.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '17.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
Second maximum Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is found at Quarter Q3 '19.
The difference of Number of monetizable daily active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.0.
Quarter Q4 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 31.0, followed by Q3 '19, and Q2 '19. Down to Quarter Q4 '17 with the lowest value 25.0.
Over the past 12 Quarters, the Number of monetizable daily active users in millions has declined.
Quarter Q3 '18, Q2 '18, Q1 '18, Q3 '17, and Q1 '17 share the same value 26.0.
The highest value 31.0 at Q4 '19 is almost 1.14 times larger than the average value 27.08.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is 325.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
